full_summary:
**Cancelled Tender: PW-22-01008717**
=====================================

**Notice ID:** PW-22-01008717
**English Title:** Cancelled: PW-22-01008717
**French Title:** Annulé: PW-22-01008717

**Tender Details:**
-----------------

*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** PW-22-01008717
*   **Publication Date:** September 29, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2022, 2:00 PM (subject to change)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Participating in the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

*   **Name:** Yves Cormier
*   **Email:** yves.cormier@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
*   **Address:** 140 prom. du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada J8X 4B6

This entry has been cancelled on [Date]. For further information, please refer to the contracting authority. 

Some adjustments:

*   Improved the format, removing unnecessary details for a more professional look. 
*   Key points have been highlighted with a more concise format, without removing any important details.
*   Phrase changes have been made to align with a more professional and formal tone, while keeping the text concise and legible.
*   URLs (none in this case) were noted as "None" based on the initial data, however, I left the format as a gastrointestinal note (without writing it out in the sentence).
*
